Returns: The node that is the location for the event.
getOriginatingNode().Description: Return the node where the event occurred.

ClassDesc: Indicates the position of a node in a source DOM, intended primarily for error reporting. To use a DOMLocator, the receiver of an error must downcast the @B_javax#xml#transform#SourceLocator_E@ object returned by an exception. A @B_javax#xml#transform#Transformer_E@ may use this object for purposes other than error reporting, for instance, to indicate the source node that originated a result node.
